import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import BottomNav from '../components/BottomNav'; const HomeScreen: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const features = [ { icon: 'üåø', title: 'Plant Monitor', desc: 'Track growth stages & health', path: '/scan' }, { icon: 'üî¨', title: 'Disease Detect', desc: 'Early warning system', path: '/scan' }, { icon: 'ü•ó', title: 'Nutrition Info', desc: 'Complete nutrient data', path: '/market' }, { icon: 'üìä', title: 'Market Trends', desc: 'Price & demand insights', path: '/analytics' }, { icon: 'üì∏', title: 'Scan Now', desc: 'Identify plant parts instantly', path: '/scan' }, { icon: 'üí¨', title: 'Ask AI', desc: 'Get expert advice anytime', path: '/chat' }, ]; return (
{/* Video Background */}
Welcome back,

Grow Smarter
with NutriLeaf

Your AI-powered companion for smart malunggay cultivation

üîç
{features.map((feature, idx) => (
navigate(feature.path)} >
{feature.icon}
{feature.title}
{feature.desc}
))}
); }; export default HomeScreen;
